abstract: Japan's core consumer prices rise, but household spending plummets, leaving possibility Bank of Japan may widen stimulus spending.
lead_paragraph: While Japan’s core consumer prices rose for the first time in five months in November, household spending tumbled.

headline.main: Mixed Japan Data Clouds Economic Outlook
headline.print_headline: Mixed Japan Data Clouds Economic Outlook

snippet: While Japan’s core consumer prices rose for the first time in five months in November, household spending tumbled.
